extends java.lang.Object
    Accessory extension's battery information.

      • deserializeBatteryReply

        public static AccBattery deserializeBatteryReply(byte[] source)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Deserialize a battery reply from the device.
        Parameters:
        source - Reply bytes from the module.
        Returns:
        Returns the class filled with appropriate batteru related information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Can throw I/O, timeout or API related exception based on the occurred error.
